body_html: You mean something like @mode/dbgo? If you need it from Python, we'd have to hack setup.py somehow I think. For C++ only, maybe https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/cpp_build/libtorch/CMakeLists.txt can be changed?
body_text: You mean something like @mode/dbgo? If you need it from Python, we'd have to hack setup.py somehow I think. For C++ only, maybe https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/cpp_build/libtorch/CMakeLists.txt can be changed?
body: You mean something like `@mode/dbgo`? If you need it from Python, we'd have to hack `setup.py` somehow I think. For C++ only, maybe https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/cpp_build/libtorch/CMakeLists.txt can be changed?
